entry.string: Write this string in the message body or subject to display the corresponding information
Subject:
Message:
Send
Cancel
The following variables will be replaced in the text with specific information:
The Registration module is useful when used in conjunction with :
an authentication module (in a default installation this is Authsystem in Core) that handles the users' login and authentication process

Check user privileges. Depending on choices you made at installation time, and additional privilege setups, you may need to create additional privileges and assign to your Anonymous users so they can view the Registration module menu link and login block.
General Options tab : allows you to set short urls and options for display of Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

Registration Options tab : provides options for user registration including default group for new uers, allowing of registration, minimum registration age, notification emails to users and the designated site administrator, enabling users to set their own password and minimum password length, display of Roles module dynamic data fields, and requirement for unique email address.
Filtering Options tab :Enables you to control registrations by blocking registrations on the basis of User Names, IP address or email address.
Login Block allows users to login and also contains a link to user Registration.
Related tutorials and documentation on Roles module at
Preferred Username

We take your right to privacy seriously and want you to feel comfortable using our web site. This Privacy Policy deals with personally identifiable information (referred to as "Data" below) that may be collected by us on our site. This Policy does not apply to other entities that we do not own or control or persons that are not our employees, agents or within our control.
Please take time to read our

Our registration process requires only a valid e-mail address and a unique user ID and password. Providing us with other information is at your option. Please take note that your user name, e-mail address, or other submissions that you make on this site may contain your real name or other personally identifiable information and, as a result, may appear on this site. Like many web sites, we may also automatically receive general information that is contained in our server log files such as your IP address and cookie information. Information about how advertising may be served on this site (if at all) is set forth below.

We may use Data to customize and improve your user experience on this site. We will make efforts so that your Data will not be provided to third parties unless (i) provided for otherwise in this Privacy Policy; (ii) we obtain your consent, such as when you choose to opt-in or opt-out to the sharing of Data; (iii) a service provided on our site requires the interaction with or is provided by a third party, by way of example an Application Service Provider; (iv) pursuant to legal process or law enforcement; (v) we find that your use of this site violates our this Policy, Terms of Service, other usage guidelines or as deemed reasonably necessary by us to protect our legal rights and/or property; (vi) or (vi) this site is purchased by a third party whereby that third party will be able to use the Data in the same manner as we can as set forth in this Policy. In the event you choose to use links that appear on our site to visit other web sites, you are advised to read the privacy policies that appear on those sites.

Like many web sites, we set and use cookies to enhance your user experience, such as retaining your personal settings. Advertisements may appear on our web site and, if so, may set and access cookies on your computer and is subject to the privacy policy of those parties providing the advertisement. However, the companies serving the advertising do not have access to our cookies. These companies usually use non-personally identifiable or anonymous codes to obtain information about your visits to our site.
You can
click here
to find out more information about your options including from the following companies that may serve advertising on our site:
For more information, please contact
our webmaster.
We provide you with the ability to edit the information in your user account information that you provided to us in registration by using
your personal page configuration area
You may request deletion of your user account by contacting
our webmaster

Content or other data that you may have provided to us and that is not contained within your user account, such as posts that may appear within our forums, may continue to remain on our site at our discretion even though your user account is deleted.

We may make changes to this Policy from time to time. We will notify you of substantial changes to this Policy either by posting a prominent announcement on our site and/or by sending a message to the e-mail address you have provided to us that is contained within your user settings.

While this Privacy Policy states our standards for maintenance of Data and we will make efforts to meet them, we are not in a position to guarantee these standards. There may be factors beyond our control that may result in disclosure of data. As a consequence, we disclaim any warranties or representations relating to maintenance or nondisclosure of Data.
If you have any questions about this Policy or our web site, please feel free to contact
our Webmaster

this link

entry.string: website administrator
You must agree to the terms and conditions of this website.
entry.translation: Sie müssen den Nutzungsbedingungen dieser Website zustimmen.

entry.string: A new user has registered. Here are the details:
entry.translation: Ein neuer Nutzer hat sich angemeldet. Hier sind die Einzelheiten:

entry.string: Full Name
Email Address
This user has agreed to the terms and conditions.
entry.translation: Dieser Nutzer hat den Nutzungsbdingungen zugestimmt.

entry.string: When a user has logged in, you can display a search form and logout link for the user by checking this box.
Choose the type of registration
Register as a:
Select a unique login name - no spaces
Login name
Enter the name you would like displayed to other site users
Display Name
Enter your email address
E-mail Address
User Details
Please enter required information
entry.translation: Bitte geben Sie die gewünschte Information ein

entry.string: an authentication module (in a default installation this is Authsystem in Core) that handles the users' login and authentication process.
the Roles module that manages Roles on your site. Registered users can be assigned to roles that you setup and configure on your site.
Add the Registration module to your module directory if it is not already present.
Install and activate the Registration module via the Module module.
Configure options through the Admin Panel Modify Config link. General, registration and filter options are available.

Check user privileges. Depending on choices you made at installation time, and additional privilege setups, you may need to create additional privileges and assign to your Anonymous users so they can view the Registration module menu link and login block.
General Options tab: allows you to set short urls and options for display of Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

Registration Options tab : provides options for user registration including default group for new users, allowing of registration, minimum registration age, notification emails to users and the designated site administrator, enabling users to set their own password and minimum password length, display of Roles module dynamic data fields, and requirement for unique email address.
Filtering Options tab :Enables you to control registrations by blocking registrations on the basis of User Names, IP address or email address.
Login Block allows users to login and also contains a link to user Registration. This block is used instead of the roles login block.
Registration Module - Xaraya Extension 30205
Related documentation on Registration
RFC 30
Enable short URLS?
Show terms of service in Registration user menu
entry.translation: Angemeldeten Nutzern die Ansicht der Nutzungsbedingungen ermöglichen

entry.string: Show privacy policy in Registration user menu
entry.translation: Angemeldeten Nutzern die Ansicht der Datenschutzerklärung ermöglichen

entry.string: Update Registration Configuration
User Registration Options
New Users automatically get assigned to this Group
entry.translation: Neue Nutzer werden automatisch dieser Gruppe zugeordnet

entry.string: Allow anonymous users to create accounts
Users need to be this age or older to register
entry.translation: Nutzer müssen dieses Alter oder älter sein, um sich zu registrieren

entry.string: Require user email addresses to be typed twice during registration
Require email address to be entered twice
Allow users to choose their own password when registering
entry.translation: Nutzern bei der Registrierung die Wahl ihres eigenen Kennworts gestatten

entry.string: Users must choose passwords with at least this many characters
entry.translation: Nutzer müssen ein Kennwort wählen mit mindestens dieser Zeichenanzahl

entry.string: Minimum Password Length:
Notify Admin when users create an account
entry.translation: Den Administrator über die Registrierung benachrichtigen

entry.string: Email address for admin notification
Administrator must approve and activate new user accounts
Users must confirm their accounts via confirmation code
Allow users to enter dynamic property values during account creation process
Show Dynamic Properties On Registration (if enabled)
Users can be notified when their account has been created
Require each user account to have a distinct email address
Email Address Must Be Unique To Each Registered User
Allow users to be hidden in user list
Allow Users To Be Invisible In Users List
Further email notifications for user role changes made specifically by Administrators (not this Registration process) can be made in the Roles Messaging configuration.
User names to which cannot be used
entry.translation: Nutzernamen, die nicht verwendet werden dürfen

entry.string: Email addresses which cannot be used
entry.translation: E-Mailadressen, die nicht verwendet werden dürfen

entry.string: Disallowed Email Addresses:
Deny access the site from these IP addresses
entry.translation: Zugang zur Webseite für folgende IP-Adressen verweigern

entry.string: Confirm Registration
Please take time to read our Terms of Use.
You can click here to find out more information about your options including from the following companies that may serve advertising on our site:
For more information, please contact our webmaster.

We provide you with the ability to edit the information in your user account information that you provided to us in registration by using your personal page configuration area. You may request deletion of your user account by contacting our webmaster.
If you have any questions about this Policy or our web site, please feel free to contact our Webmaster.
Enter your email address again to verify
entry.translation: Geben Sie Ihre Email-Adresse zur Überprüfung nochmals ein

entry.string: Retype E-mail Address
entry.translation: Geben Sie die Email-Adresse nochmals ein

entry.string: Enter a password
Password
Enter again to confirm your password
entry.translation: Geben Sie das Passwort nochmals ein, um es zu bestätigen

entry.string: Retype Password
entry.translation: Geben Sie das Passwort nochmals ein

entry.string: Please check to agree to the website requirements
To continue, please follow this link.
Please enter your user name
entry.translation: Bitte geben Sie Ihren Benützername ein

entry.string: Please enter your validation code
entry.translation: Bitte geben Sie Ihren Validierungskode ein

entry.string: Please enter your username
entry.translation: Bitte geben Sie Ihren Benützername ein

entry.string: Each time you use or cause access to this web site, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use, and as amended from time to time with or without notice to you. In addition, if you are using a particular service on or through this web site, you will be subject to any rules or guidelines applicable to those services and they shall be incorporated by reference into these Terms of Use.
Please see our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms of Use by reference.
In order to use this web site, you must register on our site, and agree to provide truthful information when requested.
Registration data and other personally identifiable information that we may collect is subject to the terms of our Privacy Policy.

You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless, our subsidiaries, affiliates, related parties, officers, directors, employees, agents, independent contractors, advertisers, partners, and co-branders from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorney's fees, that may be made by any third party, that is due to or arising out of your conduct or connection with this web site or service, your provision of Content, your violation of this Terms of Use or any other violation of the rights of another person or party.

You agree that this Terms of Use and any dispute arising out of your use of this web site or our products or services shall be governed by and construed in accordance with local laws where the headquarters of the owner of this web site is located, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. By registering or using this web site and service you consent and submit to the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of the county or city where the headquarters of the owner of this web site is located.

In the event that this Terms of Use conflicts with any law under which any provision may be held invalid by a court with jurisdiction over the parties, such provision will be interpreted to reflect the original intentions of the parties in accordance with applicable law, and the remainder of this Terms of Use will remain valid and intact; (ii) The failure of either party to assert any right under this Terms of Use shall not be considered a waiver of any that party's right and that right will remain in full force and effect; (iii) You agree that without regard to any statue or contrary law that any claim or cause arising out of this web site or its services must be filed within one (1) year after such claim or cause arose or the claim shall be forever barred; (iv) We may assign our rights and obligations under this Terms of Use and we shall be relieved of any further obligation.
